metadata:
========
Series: NE.RSB.GNFS.ZS

Aggregationmethod: Weighted average
--------
IndicatorName: External balance on goods and services (% of GDP)
--------
License_Type: CC BY-4.0
--------
License_URL: https://datacatalog.worldbank.org/public-licenses#cc-by
--------
Longdefinition: External balance on goods and services (formerly resource balance) equals exports of goods and services minus imports of goods and services (previously nonfactor services).
--------
Periodicity: Annual
--------
Source: World Bank national accounts data, and OECD National Accounts data files.
--------
Topic: Economic Policy & Debt: National accounts: Shares of GDP & other
description: External balance on goods and services (% of GDP)
